commit.message:
Rollup merge of #108688 - est31:backticks_matchmaking_library, r=jyn514

Match unmatched backticks in library/

Found with GNU grep:

```
grep -rEn '^(([^`]*`){2})*[^`]*`[^`]*$' library/ | rg -v '\s*[//]?.{1,2}```'
```

split out from #108685 as per advice.

Found with GNU grep:

```
